programme.desc: David Leeman brings his larger than life enthusiasm for his family… and his beard to face-off with The Banker.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal USA
programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep, if they choose, until its unsealing at the end of the game. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game. (11 out of 39)
